Articles.Content: Anyone else here on the forums who enjoys a WW2 strategy series called Hearts of Iron? I personally love the series. Darkest Hour is my favorite. Played a combined total of 1000 hours on all games, but I sure hope to be able to play more over the weekend. What about you. What's your favorite game, how long have you played?
I've played 43 hours of HoI4, but I haven't played any other HoI games, I have a LP of HoI4 as the Soviet Union on my YouTube channel.
